version_description:
AMAZING GRAPHICS - Talking Ben is now fully supported on iPhone 5.

SMASHING NEW BUTTONS – Talking Ben now features a new and improved UI.

NEW APP ICON – Talking Ben is looking gorgeous on his new app icon!

COMPLETELY REDESIGNED NEWSPAPER – Talking Ben now sports a brand new newspaper.

Ben is back with a new update!

New Features in version 1.1 include:

- Make Ben get into all kinds of hilarious trouble with the infinite supply pack.
- Use your Facebook login information to make it easier to share videos with your friends.
- Be the first to get news on Ben and all of the Talking Friends characters with the Outfit7 newsletter.

Become a fan of Ben's on Facebook.
We did our magic and we have you covered iOS 7 users - this app is now PERFECT for your devices!

New EXPLOSIVE update is here!
- New test tube with 4 CRAZY animations! Witness the awesome power of the whirlwind, the shocking lightning storm, the in-house volcano and the top secret project X.
- Ben has also developed an environmentally safe bug spray! The app is now bug free! :-)
iOS 8 bug fixes.
BUG-FREE: All the bugs got zapped in Ben’s lab. Now the app is better than ever!
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.
NEW VIDEO GALLERY: Lights. Camera. Action! From now on you can watch Talking Tom and Friends animated series, shorts and other videos inside the app. So just press play and enjoy the view.
Fixed in-app purchase bug.
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.
